places_to_visit.name: Prague Castle
places_to_visit.description: Prague Castle is a historic castle complex that includes the Gothic-style St. Vitus Cathedral, the Old Royal Palace, and the charming Golden Lane. It's a major cultural and architectural landmark in Prague.

places_to_visit.name: Charles Bridge
places_to_visit.description: Charles Bridge is a historic stone bridge connecting the Old Town and Lesser Town of Prague. It offers stunning views of the Vltava River and features numerous statues of saints along its length.

places_to_visit.name: Old Town Square
places_to_visit.description: Old Town Square is the historic heart of Prague, known for its colorful buildings, the Astronomical Clock, and the Týn Church. It's a lively area with shops, cafes, and street performers.

places_to_visit.name: Wenceslas Square
places_to_visit.description: Wenceslas Square is a major commercial and cultural center in Prague. It features the National Museum, historical monuments, and is a hub for shopping and dining.

places_to_visit.name: John Lennon Wall
places_to_visit.description: The John Lennon Wall is a colorful tribute to John Lennon and a symbol of freedom and peace. It’s covered in Beatles-inspired graffiti and offers a unique and vibrant photo opportunity.
